activities: The Company collects personal information when a user, including users from the EU/EEA and Switzerland, creates an account, participates in registration forms, feedback forms, order forms or surveys; receives customer or technical support; and when a user communicates with others through the website, such as when a User engages in our chat rooms; and when a user links their account with social media services. The Company may collect personal information such as names, billing address, phone number, and credit/debit card information from users. Additionally, users will be given the opportunity to provide the Company with additional information, such as providing a photo, and information regarding the user’s age, gender, and birthdate.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data of all website users that provide the Company with personal data.
recoursemech: The European Union Data Protection Authorities.
